feed.title: Zitnik Lab
feed.subtitle: Harvard Machine Learning for Medicine and Science

entry.title: Is AI sycophancy holding science back?

link.title: Is AI sycophancy holding science back?

entry.content: A piece in Nature explores how AI sycophancy, in which models agree too much with users instead of reasoning on its own, could affect the use of AI in medical research.
entry.summary: A piece in Nature explores how AI sycophancy, in which models agree too much with users instead of reasoning on its own, could affect the use of AI in medical research.

entry.title: Our research featured by Kempner and Crimson

link.title: Our research featured by Kempner and Crimson

entry.content: A news story about PDGrapher in Harvard Crimson. ToolUniverse featured on the Kempner Institute blog.
entry.summary: A news story about PDGrapher in Harvard Crimson. ToolUniverse featured on the Kempner Institute blog.

entry.title: A Scientist’s Guide to AI Agents in Nature

link.title: A Scientist’s Guide to AI Agents in Nature

entry.content: A piece on AI agents in Nature highlights ongoing projects in our group, including methods for evaluating scientific hypotheses, challenges in benchmarking AI agents, and the open ToolUniverse ecosystem.
entry.summary: A piece on AI agents in Nature highlights ongoing projects in our group, including methods for evaluating scientific hypotheses, challenges in benchmarking AI agents, and the open ToolUniverse ecosystem.

entry.title: ToolUniverse: AI Agents for Science and Medicine

link.title: ToolUniverse: AI Agents for Science and Medicine

entry.content: New paper: ToolUniverse introduces an open ecosystem for building AI scientists with 600+ scientific and biomedical tools. Build your AI co-scientists at https://aiscientist.tools.
entry.summary: New paper: ToolUniverse introduces an open ecosystem for building AI scientists with 600+ scientific and biomedical tools. Build your AI co-scientists at https://aiscientist.tools.

entry.title: Democratizing “AI Scientists” with ToolUniverse
entry.content: Our new initiative: Use Tool Universe to build an AI scientist for yourself from any language or reasoning model, whether open or closed. https://aiscientist.tools
entry.summary: Our new initiative: Use Tool Universe to build an AI scientist for yourself from any language or reasoning model, whether open or closed. https://aiscientist.tools

entry.title: InfEHR in Nature Communications
entry.content: Collaboration with Ben and Girish on clinical phenotype resolution through deep geometric learning on electronic health records published in Nature Communications.
entry.summary: Collaboration with Ben and Girish on clinical phenotype resolution through deep geometric learning on electronic health records published in Nature Communications.

entry.title: PDGrapher in Nature Biomedical Engineering
entry.content: New paper in Nature Biomedical Engineering introducing PDGrapher, a model for phenotype-based target discovery. [Harvard Medicine News]
entry.summary: New paper in Nature Biomedical Engineering introducing PDGrapher, a model for phenotype-based target discovery. [Harvard Medicine News]

entry.title: AI and Net Medicine: Path to Precision Medicine

link.title: AI and Net Medicine: Path to Precision Medicine

entry.content: New perspective published in NEJM AI on advancing AI and network medicine on a path to precision medicine.
entry.summary: New perspective published in NEJM AI on advancing AI and network medicine on a path to precision medicine.

entry.title: CUREBench - Reasoning for Therapeutics
entry.content: Update from CUREBench: 650+ entrants, 100+ teams and 500+ submissions. Thank you to the CUREBench community. Working on AI for drug discovery and reasoning in medicine? New teams welcome. Tasks, rules, and leaderboard: https://curebench.ai.
entry.summary: Update from CUREBench: 650+ entrants, 100+ teams and 500+ submissions. Thank you to the CUREBench community. Working on AI for drug discovery and reasoning in medicine? New teams welcome. Tasks, rules, and leaderboard: https://curebench.ai.

entry.title: Drug Discovery Workshop at NeurIPS 2025
entry.content: Excited to organize a NeurIPS workshop on Virtual Cells and Digital Instruments. Submit your papers.
entry.summary: Excited to organize a NeurIPS workshop on Virtual Cells and Digital Instruments. Submit your papers.
